full_text:
DEMONSTRATION EQUIPMENT PROHIBITED.

	(a)	No person shall carry or possess while participating in any demonstration, rally, picket line or public assembly, any length of lumber, wood, or wood lath unless that object is one-fourth inch or less in thickness and two inches or less in width, or if not generally rectangular in shape, such object shall not exceed three-quarters inch in its thickest dimension.  (Added by Ord. No. 151,435, Eff. 9/6/78.)

5.catch_line: Assault Weapons – Sale Or Possession Prohibited.

6.catch_line: Use Of Bows And Arrows Prohibited.

8.catch_line: Glass Bottles On Public Property Prohibited.

10.catch_line: Carry Knives Or Daggers In Plain View Prohibited.

12.catch_line: Duty To Report Theft Or Loss Of Firearms; Exemptions.

14.catch_line: Sale Of Ammunition Clips And Similar Devices.

15.catch_line: Sale Or Purchase Of More Than One Handgun Within A Thirty Day Period Prohibited.

18.catch_line: Possession Of Gun Parts In Airports.

19.catch_line: Sale Of Large Caliber Firearms Prohibited.

20.catch_line: Sale Of Ammunition For Large Caliber Firearms Prohibited.

21.catch_line:
False Or Secret Compartments In Vehicles To Hide
Firearms Or Destructive Devices.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

DEMONSTRATION EQUIPMENT PROHIBITED. (§ 55.07)

  DEMONSTRATION EQUIPMENT PROHIBITED.	(a)	No person shall carry or possess
while participating in any demonstration, rally, picket line or public assembly,
any length of lumber, wood, or wood lath unless that object is one-fourth inch
or less in thickness and two inches or less in width, or if not generally
rectangular in shape, such object shall not exceed three-quarters inch in its
thickest dimension.  (Added by Ord. No. 151,435, Eff. 9/6/78.)
